featured.text: After hours of discussion, our class finally reached the _____ that we would go to Hualien for our graduation trip.
Despite his busy schedule, the President ______ the school’s graduation ceremony with his presence and a heartwarming speech. (A) praised (B) graced (C) addressed (D) credited 10.
Our personal celebrations, 22 weddings, promotions, graduations, and anniversaries, are 23 linked with drinking.
They are part of the graduation ceremony.
After his graduation from college, … B.…in that someone will take care of it.

definition.zh_def: 畢業，指完成學業並獲得學位或證書的過程。
definition.en_def: The act of receiving a degree or diploma upon completion of a course of study.
definition.example: She celebrated her graduation with a big party.
